main event: An oval object, resembling a meteor, was observed in the sky on February 7, 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a silver dollar to a basketball., The object had a green and white color and emitted bright flashes., The sighting lasted for approximately 3 to 4 minutes., Observers used binoculars for better visual confirmation., The object's course was reported to be from North to South.
witness description: The observers reported visual characteristics of the object during its appearance.
